data.name: RetroArch - Beetle Saturn
data.detailed_description: Beetle Saturn is a 32-bit, 5th generation videogame console emulator.
data.about_the_game: Beetle Saturn is a 32-bit, 5th generation videogame console emulator.
data.short_description: The Beetle Saturn is a 32-bit, fifth-generation home system.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any GPU and driver that supports OpenGL v2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

data.legal_notice:

It does not contain any copyrighted material by third parties. RetroArch does not condone piracy in any way, shape or form.
